experiences.title: Data Structures and Algorithms Teaching Assistant
experiences.company: College of Engineering - University of Michigan
experiences.mainPoint: This is where I fell in love with teaching :)
experiences.description: I had the privilege of supporting 950+ students by instructing weekly 2 hour labs of 30+ undergraduates, providing 1-on-1 office hours, and authoring concise exam questions. Collaborating with students was a blast!

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.company: Michigan Public Health Integrated Center for Outbreak Analytics and Modeling (MICOM)
experiences.mainPoint: Here, I realized my passion for "tech for good"
experiences.description: In this role, I pair programmed, implemented, and peer reviewed key full stack features on an incredible project that graphically tracks state vaccination records. This $17.5 million project helps epidemiologists to analyze trends and better allocate resources to underprivileged areas.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.company: Information and Technology Services - University of Michigan
experiences.mainPoint: This is where I discovered the excitement of full-stack development!
experiences.description: I independently designed and implemented a user-friendly full stack web application that enables network engineers to create and provision customized tests to Raspberry Pi computers. This facilitates wireless WiFi testing at the click of a button - pretty neat, huh?

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.company: Dynamic Map Platform North America (formerly Ushr)
experiences.mainPoint: Here, I built confidence and reaffirmed my love for CS and math.
experiences.description: I explored the landscape of semi-autonomous vehicles via data analysis and test-driven development. Notably, I authored an interactive dashboard complete with descriptive datasets and plots, along with automated test cases to support development of a data extraction application.
